field.comment: Specify grace period in seconds for config file generation. If field is empty default value 300 will be saved. This grace period will be used to serve cached content when the server is healthy. If the server is not healthy, cached content will be served for 1 day before failing.

field.label: Enable Back/forward cache
field.comment: Enable Back/forward cache functionality. See web.dev for more info on bfcache.

field.label: Tracking Parameters
field.comment: Specify tracking parameters to strip off of incoming requests to increase hit rate. This is not applied automatically! Read the README of the Elgentos_VarnishExtended extension on GitHub; https://github.com/elgentos/magento2-varnish-extended.
